basics.name: Lucy Cifferello
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary:
Hey! I'm a code crusher in the making and am passionate about starting a career as a kick-ass full-stack web developer. I really enjoy understanding the underlying processes of code, creating new ways to approach problems, and really breaking things down to get into each puzzle piece. I want to be a part of an awesome company where I feel like I am contributing to its growth and success.
Check out my LinkedIn for a more in depth description about myself.

work.summary: Responsible for conveying product image through performance skills.

Responsible for commissioned high-end retail sales in a customer service-based company. Position developed skills in building a client base, booking appointments, and maintaining client relationships.
highlights: On track to be company Pacesetter

work.company: Western Institute for Neurodevelopmental Studies and Interventions (WINSi)
work.summary: Responsible for the assessment and analysis of trends through collected treatment plan data, organization of the daily schedule of 10 professional staff and team members, development and monitoring of multidisciplinary care plans and case management tools, maintenance of patient databases, communication of organization services and goals to potential clients, and compilation of data for research presentations.
